title: koolbitz 350+ Parts Plug-In Building Block Toys, 2D 3D Engineering Blocks Building Toy Kit, Builders Play Set Ideal Educational Gift Construction Toy Creative Learning Set
features: This Construction Set Includes: 350 plug-in building blocks and a detailed instruction book for creating multiple 2D and 3D models. The set features over 350 transparent pieces that can be easily taken apart and reassembled, offering unlimited creative possibilities.

Foster Creativity & Productivity: Instead of screen time with video games or smartphones, this Building Engineering Blocks set encourages your child to create and innovate. They can construct challenging models like trucks, helicopters, airplanes, flowers, ladybugs, pineapples, Ferris wheels, castles, motorcycles, sailboats, aliens, robots, and more, giving them a rewarding sense of accomplishment.

Enhance Social Skills: In today’s world, teamwork and collaboration are essential. This Engineering Blocks set is designed to help your child develop social skills from an early age. It encourages children to work together, fostering teamwork and collaboration as they create amazing projects together.
Vibrant & Safe: Includes 350 colorful pieces made from high-quality, non-toxic materials that are both visually stimulating and durable for long-lasting, safe play.
Easy & Portable: The plug-in design allows for effortless assembly of various shapes, while its compact size ensures easy storage and portability, ideal for play anywhere.
description: Product Description This vibrant and versatile construction set is designed to stimulate young minds, offering endless possibilities for building and imaginative play. Each snowflake-shaped piece connects easily, allowing children to create anything from simple shapes to complex structures. Previous page Next page 1 Product Measurement 2 How To Play 350PCS DIY Building Blocks Toys Snowflakes! Ideal for children aged 3 and up, this educational toy set is perfect for both solo play and collaborative fun with friends and family. 1 2 3 Previous page Next page 1 Creactive Design 2 Manual Book Bullet Points: Educational and Developmental: This construction toy set is perfect for enhancing children's fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and cognitive development, making learning fun and interactive. Easy Storage and Portability: The set comes with a sturdy storage box with a handle, making it easy to keep the pieces organized and portable for on-the-go play, whether at home, in the classroom, or during travel. Specifications: Material: Non-toxic, BPA-free plastic Number of Pieces: 350 Block Shape: Snowflake Storage: Comes with a durable storage box with a handle What are the educational benefits of the DIY Building Blocks Snowflakes 350PCS toy? It improves fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, spatial reasoning, and problem-solving. It also encourages creativity and teamwork through fun, interactive play. What age group is this DIY Building Blocks toy suitable for? It’s suitable for children aged 3 years and up. Younger kids can enjoy simple builds, while older ones can create more complex designs. How does this set promote creativity and imaginative play? The set’s colourful snowflake blocks connect easily, allowing kids to build various shapes and structures, sparking their imagination and creativity. Is the set easy to store and transport? Yes, it comes with a sturdy storage box with a handle for easy organization and portability, perfect for play at home or on the go. Are the materials safe for children? Yes, the blocks are made from non-toxic, BPA-free plastic with smooth edges, ensuring safe play for kids.
